headline.main: Books of The Times; Efficient and Simple Heightened Awareness

docs.abstract: Fixx, James F: The Complete Book of Running revd by Christopher Lehmann-Haupt; illus
docs.lead_paragraph: IT IS no longer primarily the dog and the frog that we must worry about when steering automobiles along narrow leafy lanes. Now looms the jogger with the hectic flush, Phaidippides reborn, with news that Anxiety, Obesity and Cholesterol have fallen on the plain of Marathon.
